name: Operation Kitty
description:
(Made in one week for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 3)

HOW TO PLAY

- [WASD] to move, [E] to interact with agents

- The game is based a a real project by the CIA during the cold war called "Acoustic Kitty". Over 20 million dollars were spent on the project. Unfortunately, the mission was cancelled in 1967 after the unfortunate cat was run over by a taxi.

- Want to learn more about "Acoustic Kitty"? Check out these links:

https://thememorypalace.us/episode-16-secret-kitty/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acoustic_Kitty

CREDITS

- Code and Graphics by me, xamuil2                                                                                                         

- Sound effects from Scratch library, 8 bit mission impossible by Overland Andy (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDIpRV4lq4jr-9aiIh635qQ), menu music by Yahtzei from NG (https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/616340)
